author: Anonymous Poet
title: How do I get better at Search problems
question: I've been trying to go through search problems and I still find problem set 9 and lab 9 extremely difficult. I draw everything out, my tree looks pretty good in my opinion, however, I'm just struggling to put this into a working function. I am able to 'template blend' it quite intuitively, which is supposed to make this easier I thought however I am still clueless...
instructor_answer:
If you've got the time, you could watch the recordings for the in-class search lecture file. Work on it as you go along, and do the entire process from scratch afterwards.
If you're short on time, I suggest going to Office Hours.
